As a public service, a bigger sample:  
 [http://33993.static.securearea.eu/Files/2/33000/33993/ProductPhotos/Larg...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419194455/http:/33993.static.securearea.eu/Files/2/33000/33993/ProductPhotos/Large/62183081.jpg "http://33993.static.securearea.eu/Files/2/33000/33993/ProductPhotos/Large/62183081.jpg")

Bathroom rules appears to be Baskerville Oldface:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/baskerville-old-face/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419194455/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/baskerville-old-face/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/baskerville-old-face/")

Wash Brush Floss Flush is Bickley Script:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bickley-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419194455/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bickley-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bickley-script/")
